Text: JanieJanie I regret that when you called yesterday you didnt feel that anyone outside of me knew what was going with your portfolio Let me reassure you that there are several that are part of the team that immerse themselves in the accounts that we manage Unfortunately insurance products are held at the insurance company We have submitted the proper paperwork to change the broker dealer That has been done Now were waiting for First Union to network the annuities into your account so we can see them daily We at anytime can call Venture and get values and allocations We also have your profile on a spreadsheet where we track your Venture piece k Accounts with us etc Let me give you the result of the Annuities Current market Grip value Currently in Cash Current market Grip value Currently in Cash Current market Grip value Currently in cash Current market Grip value Currently in cash Current Market Grip value Currently in cash Current Market Grip value Currently in Aim All CAP The grip value is the guaranteed value through annuitization You have a guaranteed growth rate of on an annual basis with a step up election if the market value has performed greater than The markets were great in and with the first annuities that we made an invest in We stepped up the market performance and that is why the grip value is at the levels listed We are in the final stages of the annuities being networked into your accounts One has already shown up on the account The other should follow through shortly Ill track it daily and keep you posted The important thing for you to know is the the positions are in cash except Josephs I spoke to him last night he sure sounds like a fun guy annuity Hope that this helps Pat Patrick Dowd Senior Vice PresidentInvestment Officer EMERY Financial Group phone toll free fax
